comments.body:
Add comment:

```yaml
# License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/ExpectozJJ/GeneralisedFormanRicci/pull/2
license_file: LICENSE
```

This will be a reminder to check the status of the license file in the source distribution in the future. If my PR upstream (https://github.com/ExpectozJJ/GeneralisedFormanRicci/pull/2) gets merged or a different solution is found, then once that release is updated in the feedstock, the manually packaged license can be removed as well as the comment.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +39,43 @@  license_family: APACHE
  # License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/ExpectozJJ/GeneralisedFormanRicci/pull/2
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: A class to compute the Generalised Forman-Ricci curvature for a Simplicial Complex from a given point cloud data.
  description: |
